> That's what I got so 
> far.  Hey, it used to look like a dog. [Admittedly,
> I still gotta do 
> lots of work, but I'm open for suggestions.  Yea, I
> know it's a really 
> rough screen capture.]

The problem is with the head and the body. The head
needs to be elongated, to be more horse-like, and the
body needs to be about twice as thick. You should
probably also draw an outline of an actual horse so
that you can compare your drawing to the minimap.

> 
> If anybody is interested, I'm looking for a little
> help getting 
> started with some follow-up scenarios to my last
> set.  The main thing 
> I am looking for is establishing the plot lines. 
> I've run into a 
> little knack because I need at least 2 paths to
> follow at a point and 
> I have only 1.

Well, go do research on the actual Greek mythology of
the Trojan War. That should give you *plenty* of ideas.
